lines.gurmukhi: gurisK eykmyk rom n pujis koit hom jig Bog neIbyd pUjwcwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Gursikh Aykamayk Rom N Pujasi Koti , Hom Jagi Bhog Naeebayd Poojaachaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: No one, not even millions of offerings to the fire, celestial feasts, offerings to the gods and other forms of worship, rites and rituals can reach even a hair of a Sikh who has become one with his True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: jog iDAwn igAwn AiDAwqm iriD isiD inDo jp qp sMjmwid Aink pRkwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jog Dhiaan Giaan Adhiaatam Ridhi Sidhi Nidho , Jap Tap Sanjamaadi Anik Prakaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Many forms of Yogas contemplations, exercises to control the body and other disciplines of Yoga, miraculous powers and other forms of obstinate worships cannot reach to match a hair of a Guru's Sikh.

lines.gurmukhi: isMmiRiq purwn byd swsqR Aau swAMgIq sursr dyv sbl mwieAw ibsQwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sinmriti Puraan Bayd Saasatr Au Saaangeeta , Surasar Dayv Sabal Maaiaa Bisadaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: All the Simritis, Vedas, Purans, other scriptures, music, rivers like Ganges, abodes of gods and expanse of mammon in the entire Universe can reach the praise of a hair of a Guru's Sikh who has become one with the True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin isK sMgiq AsMK jw kY sRI gur crn nyq nyq nmskwr hY ]192]
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Sikh Sangati Asankh Jaa Kai , Sree Gur Charan Nayt Nayt Namasakaar Hai ?192?

Shabad OS B.translation: Countless are the congregations of such Sikhs of the Guru. Such a True Guru is beyond count. He is infinite. We salute at His holy feet again and again. (192)
